title: Ethers errors building a project with Foundry / Ethers 1.0.2/1.5.0
body:
# Overview
We're building a project in CI and it seems that foundry may still be pegged to problematic ethers versions?
On both builds/clippy's we get the following errors.

# Errors
```
error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
 --> /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ethers-contract-1.5.0/src/multicall/contract.rs:4:1
  |
4 | abigen!(Multicall3, "src/multicall/multicall_abi.json");
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
  |
  = note: this error originates in the macro `abigen` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: cannot find attribute `ethcall` in this scope
 --> /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ethers-contract-1.5.0/src/multicall/contract.rs:4:1
  |
4 | abigen!(Multicall3, "src/multicall/multicall_abi.json");
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: this error originates in the macro `abigen` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
 --> /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ethers-contract-1.5.0/src/multicall/contract.rs:4:1
  |
4 | abigen!(Multicall3, "src/multicall/multicall_abi.json");
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
  |
  = help: consider importing one of these items:
          crate::Lazy
          futures_util::future::Lazy
          once_cell::sync::Lazy
          once_cell::unsync::Lazy
  = note: this error originates in the macro `abigen` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
 --> /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ethers-contract-1.5.0/src/multicall/contract.rs:4:1
  |
4 | abigen!(Multicall3, "src/multicall/multicall_abi.json");
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
  |
  = help: consider importing one of these items:
          crate::Contract
          ethers_core::abi::Contract
  = note: this error originates in the macro `abigen` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
 --> /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ethers-contract-1.5.0/src/multicall/contract.rs:4:1
  |
4 | abigen!(Multicall3, "src/multicall/multicall_abi.json");
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ could not find `ethers` in the list of imported crates
  |
  = help: consider importing this trait:
          ethers_core::abi::AbiEncode
  = note: this error originates in the macro `abigen` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

```
Closingâ€”not applicable anymore as this has been resolved.
